TopicTitle: Wings attached upside down in mirror symetry

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, first time that ever happens to me. I guess it might come from a mod. You can clearly see what I mean in this picture : 

Again, I already am in mirror symetry, here is the list of my mods :

Looks like Infernal Robotics was the source of the problem in recent threads. You should be able to fix it by installing version 3.1.8 until this bug is resolved.
that's correct... the updated version 3.1.10 fixes that... sorry
